app.title: Cosmos Validator Dashboard
app.description: Track staking info, monitor Cosmos validators easily.

hero.title: Cosmos Staking Dashboard
hero.subtitle: Track validators, analyze staking performance, and manage your delegations in the Cosmos ecosystem.
hero.search_placeholder: Search for an address, validator, or transaction...

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Comprehensive tools for both validators and delegators in the Cosmos ecosystem

validator_analytics.title: Validator Analytics
validator_analytics.description: Detailed analysis of validator performance, uptime, and commission rates

delegator_dashboard.title: Delegator Dashboard
delegator_dashboard.description: Track rewards, unbonding periods, and total amount staked

validator_alerts.title: Validator Alerts
validator_alerts.description: Receive notifications when validators are jailed or show signs of poor performance

staking_security.title: Staking Security
staking_security.description: Risk assessment and network decentralization analysis

apr_comparison.title: APR Comparison
apr_comparison.description: Compare staking returns between different validators

auto_compound.title: Auto-compound
auto_compound.description: Automatically reinvest rewards to maximize staking returns

unbonding_tracker.title: Unbonding Tracker
unbonding_tracker.description: Track unbonding time and token release schedule

governance_voting.title: Governance Voting
governance_voting.description: Participate in and track governance proposals in the Cosmos ecosystem

footer.description: Validator and delegator monitoring tool for the Cosmos ecosystem, helping you optimize staking returns.
